name: Van Wizards vs The Mageocracy
description:
Van Wizards vs the Mageocracy is a story of found family, magic and wonder, and rebelling against an oppressive Government force!

Hop in your van and enjoy a diceless gaming system, meant to focus on the creativity and individuality that magic allows!

Using a Decals system, qualify your magical skills with words of power that change the way your magic looks and effects the World around it!

This product comes with the full game, character sheet, and a beginning "Vibe" for new Vibes Masters!

Journey through a World of Absurdism and Magical Wonder, fight back against the Mageocracy, and enjoy the vibes.
